source: TEXT_STMBDZ013_02647_SEQ_00<tab>Gelen's house is somewhat breezier than usual.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ013_02647_SEQ_00<tab>アラガーナのゲレンは、家にできた大きなひび割れを気にしているようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ013_02647_TODO_00<tab>Slay earth sprites and obtain their cores.
TEXT_STMBDZ013_02647_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the earth sprite cores to Gelen.
TEXT_STMBDZ013_02647_GELEN_000_000<tab>Would you mind givin' me a hand? I've not got long left. It's the least you could do.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ013_02647_GELEN_000_000なあ、お前さん。
老い先の短い、この老いぼれの頼みを聞いてくれないかい？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ013_02647_GELEN_000_001<tab>I've been livin' in this house ever since I got married. It was never in what I would call good nick, but it is mine. However, recently a huge crack appeared in the wall.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ013_02647_GELEN_000_001生まれたときから住み続け、あちこちガタついている我が家に、
つい最近、大きなひび割れが入ってしまってな……。
このままだと、家が真っ二つに割れてしまいそうなんじゃ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ013_02647_GELEN_000_002<tab>I'd repair it myself, but I don't have the necessary materials. Do an old woman a favor and slay three earth sprites. You'll find some by the Ziggurat. Bring back their cores and we'll see if this house can't be fixed.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ013_02647_GELEN_000_002じゃが、補修しようにも材料が足りん。
赤のジグラート周辺にいる「」を倒して、
「」を3つ、手に入れておくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ013_02647_GELEN_000_10<tab>Do an old woman a favor and slay three earth sprites. Bring back their cores and we'll see if this house can't be fixed.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ013_02647_GELEN_000_10補修しようにも材料が足りん。
赤のジグラート周辺にいる「」を倒して、
「」を3つ、手に入れておくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ013_02647_GELEN_000_020<tab>You best not have come back without those cores.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ013_02647_GELEN_000_020<tab>どれどれ、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8CA701 /var>」は、手に入ったかい？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ013_02647_GELEN_000_021<tab>Lovely! I'll get to work breakin' these up right away. Then I just need mix them into a paste that I can apply to the crack.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ013_02647_GELEN_000_021ありがたい、これでまだ我が家に住めそうじゃ。
このを砕いて、
モルタルといっしょに、岩壁のひびに塗り込むのさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ013_02647_GELEN_000_022<tab>That should stop it from reappearin' for a few years yet. With any luck, I won't even be around to see it crack again!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ013_02647_GELEN_000_022そうすれば、土属性の力が強まり、
ひび割れの拡大を防ぐことができるという寸法じゃな。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ013_02647_GELEN_000_023<tab>Apparently the very ground we stand on used to be part of the quarry. Then, one day someone decided to start using it as a rest area. Eventually a house was built here─one thing led to another─and, before anyone knew it, a whole settlement had popped up.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ013_02647_GELEN_000_023この家は、かつての石切場跡でのう……。
石を切り出した穴を、誰かが休憩所として使い始め、
それがいつしか家となり……集落となったそうじゃ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ013_02647_GELEN_000_024<tab>Anyway, that's enough stories for one day. Thank you, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ013_02647_GELEN_000_024私の爺さんの爺さんも、この家に住んでおったそうな。
さあ、昔話は、ここらで終いとしておくかの。
あらためて礼を言うぞ、お前さん。
